typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		IPAddress as string,
		partyId as string,
		policyRole as string,
		status as string,
		updateTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	singleDocument: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(Date = toTimestamp(updateTime)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		{_id} as string,
		partyId as string,
		updateTime as string,
		IPAddress as string,
		documentContext as string,
		document as string,
		submissionId as string,
		submissionVersion as string,
		policyId as string,
		referenceDocumenId as string,
		status as string,
		policyRole as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		updateTime = Date
	)) ~> sink1
